snippet: A version of “The Play of Daniel” has returned to the Fuentidueña Chapel at the Cloisters in honor of the 75th anniversary of the museum’s opening.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews Gotham Early Music Scene production of liturgical drama The Play of Daniel at the Cloisters.
lead_paragraph: A version of “The Play of Daniel” has returned to the Fuentidueña Chapel at the Cloisters in honor of the 75th anniversary of the museum’s opening.

headline.seo: ‘The Play of Daniel’ at the Cloisters
headline.main: In a Work From the Dawn of Opera, Daniel Avoids Becoming Some Lions’ Lunch
headline.print_headline: In a Work From the Dawn of Opera, Daniel Avoids Becoming Some Lions’ Lunch
